description: Given that one of the following properties is set, the form will only submit when the respective condition is fulfilled. Otherwise, a validation error will be displayed.

required.description: Form field must contain a value.

validationType.description: Use predefined validation patterns. Available options are: Email, Phone, and Custom (empty).

pattern.description: Form field value must match the provided RegEx pattern.

minLength.description: Form field value must be at least the provided length.

maxLength.description: Form field value must be at most the provided length.

min.description: Form field value must be at least the provided number.

max.description: Form field value must be at most the provided number.
